fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player, their role will become whatever role is one post below their current role. Example: 3456 -> 3455. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If their new role can't exist, they will keep moving down until they become a compatible role.
- They lose all attributes of their old role, including Attack, Defense, Factional Chats, and other intrinsic attributes.
- Conversion Immune players will not have their roles changed, you are told of this and do not lose a charge if this is the case.
- You may not use this ability on yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Good-Aligned faction(s) lose, whether dead or alive.
